docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, May 16--Russian jamming of foreign radio broadcasts was condemned here today by a United Nations Subcommission on Freedom of Information and the Press by a vote of 8 to 0. The Egyptian, French and Yugoslav experts abstained.
